title: General Legal AI Starter
description: A safe default playbook: pick a small stack, keep an audit trail, and ship usable drafts quickly.
checklist: Define goal and constraints (jurisdiction, deadlines, scope)
Draft a first pass, then force source-check and revision
Log decisions: what was used, when, and what changed
Escalate to human review for high-risk sections
risk_notes: AI helps draft and organize, but it does not replace legal review.
For high sensitivity matters, use approved tools only.

seo.title: Legal AI Starter Playbook
seo.description: A default legal AI workflow with checklist and risk notes.
